pyramid.plunder

Class SmallGun

  • java.lang.Object
    • pyramid.plunder.Weapon
      • pyramid.plunder.SmallGun

  • public class SmallGun
extends Weapon
    This SmallGun class extends the Weapon Class; where the characteristics of the small gun are implemented and where the Draw Method draws the gun and defines the location with the sprite.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class pyramid.plunder.Weapon

        cooldown, cooldownTime, damage, damageEnemies, graphics, multiHit, name, rangeX, rangeY, type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmallGun(int damage)
      The Small Gun is passed down int damage, the range of 300 by 300 is defined, and other characteristics of multihit and and damage to enemies is implemented.
      SmallGun(int damage, int x, int y, int speed, java.lang.String name) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This Draw method is passed down the Graphics g, defines the location, and draws the gun at the locations with sprite.
      static Weapon randomWeapon()
      This Weapon randomWeapon randomly generates the various guns across the game and in the shop; there are 50 Types of Guns from which a random selection can occur.

      • Methods inherited from class pyramid.plunder.Weapon

        inRange, priceWeapon, use

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • Draw

        public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This Draw method is passed down the Graphics g, defines the location, and draws the gun at the locations with sprite.
        Overrides:
        Draw in class Weapon

      • randomWeapon

        public static Weapon randomWeapon()
        This Weapon randomWeapon randomly generates the various guns across the game and in the shop; there are 50 Types of Guns from which a random selection can occur. In addition to this, the damage, speed, and range are also random to an extent.
